Moka

5'4" (162 cm)
Group (2023-present):
ILLIT

Introduction

Moka is a Japanese singer and dancer under Belift Lab. She is the lead dancer, sub vocalist and visual of the South Korean girl group ILLIT.

In June 2023, she participated in HYBE and Belift Lab's survival show called R U Next?, where she was chosen by the label to be the fifth member to debut in the final group ILLIT.
